head.title: The Politics of Oil, Then and Now

hedline.hl1: The Politics of Oil, Then and Now

abstract.p: Suk Choo Chang letter on release of oil from Strategic Petroleum Reserve holds it is of overriding importance that Americans have a 'warm and happy winter'

block.p: Re ''Politics or Policy?'' (new analysis, front page, Sept. 23):

Is the release of oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve for a political reason or a policy reason? In fact, it has been said that there is no human act without political implication. So isn't it of overriding importance that the American public have a warm and happy winter rather than a cold and discontented one?
SUK CHOO CHANG Waterbury, Conn., Sept. 23, 2000
